dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach new challenges?

options.description: Your FarTwin will tackle risks head-on, willing to take calculated leaps into the unknown.
Your FarTwin will approach challenges with a careful and measured pace, weighing risks before acting.

dimensions.label: Teamwork Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin collaborate with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will work closely with team members, actively seeking input and contributions to achieve shared goals.
Your FarTwin will approach collaboration with a competitive mindset, focusing on individual achievements over team success.

dimensions.label: Problem-Solving Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach problem-solving?

options.description: Your FarTwin will analyze problems using logical reasoning and data-driven insights to find solutions.
Your FarTwin will rely on intuition and creative thinking to approach problems with a unique perspective.

dimensions.label: Learning Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin acquire new knowledge?

options.description: Your FarTwin will take ownership of their learning, seeking out resources and taking initiative to explore new topics.
Your FarTwin will prefer a structured approach to learning, following established frameworks and curricula to gain knowledge.

dimensions.label: Career Ambition
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin pursue their career goals?

options.description: Your FarTwin will set high standards for themselves and strive to achieve exceptional success in their chosen field.
Your FarTwin will prioritize stability and security, aiming for steady progress rather than rapid advancement.

dimensions.label: Creative Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express their creativity?

options.description: Your FarTwin will freely express themselves creatively, taking risks and pursuing unconventional ideas.
Your FarTwin will carefully consider their creative expressions, seeking to refine and polish their work before sharing it with others.

dimensions.label: Social Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with friends and acquaintances?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be the center of attention, actively engaging with others and sharing their thoughts and experiences.
Your FarTwin will prefer to observe and listen, preferring smaller social circles and deeper meaningful connections.

dimensions.label: Time Management Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prioritize their time?

options.description: Your FarTwin will stick to a strict schedule, prioritizing efficiency and meeting deadlines.
Your FarTwin will adapt to changing circumstances, adjusting their schedule as needed to accommodate new challenges or opportunities.
